definition: to draw out/to pull out from in between/to remove part of the whole/(of certain plants) to sprout or bud/to whip or thrash

sentences.english: He made samplings of the different materials on the very day.
sentences.chinese: 他當天對那些不同的材料分別進行了抽樣檢驗。

sentences.english: What kind of sampling procedure do you use?
sentences.chinese: 你將採用什麼樣的抽樣程序？

sentences.english: Not the right side edge to the collection of samples.
sentences.chinese: 沒有邊權的邊如何抽樣。

sentences.english: Methods Making research on 1021 patients by random sampling.
sentences.chinese: 方法採用隨機抽樣的方法調查1021例患者。

sentences.english: Findings from a Population Based Survey.
sentences.chinese: 基於人口抽樣調查的發現。

sentences.english: A subsample based watermarking scheme has been investigated for digital audio in this study.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一種基於分抽樣的音頻數字水印算法。

sentences.english: The procedure and principle of two-stage ACS are presented in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 概述兩階段自適應羣團抽樣方法的技術思路和原理。

sentences.english: The content of the second chapter is about precise asymptotics of bootstrap means.
sentences.chinese: 第二章的內容是關於再抽樣均值序列的精確漸近性質。

sentences.english: Large-scale sample surveys are always undertaken with stratified multi-stage sampling.
sentences.chinese: 大型抽樣調查總是採用分層多階段抽樣。

sentences.english: Large-scale sample surveys are always undertaken with stratified multi-stage sampling.
sentences.chinese: 大型抽樣調查總是採用分層多階段抽樣。

sentences.english: Methods: A total of 40 medical personnel in PICU were investigated by random sampling.
sentences.chinese: 隨機抽樣調查兒科監護室的40名醫護人員。

sentences.english: Face to face interview was carried out during the optimum allocation random stratified sampling survey process.
sentences.chinese: 最優分配隨機分層抽樣方法則採用訪談，獲得數據。

sentences.english: This paper trys to use the importance sampling method.
sentences.chinese: 在本文中，嘗試使用重要抽樣方法。

sentences.english: Try to a achieve a random sample of the target audience
sentences.chinese: 儘量取得目標羣體的隨機抽樣。

sentences.english: We used random sampling method and selected 1040 cases to do this study.
sentences.chinese: 採取隨機抽樣研究的方法，抽取病例1040份。

sentences.english: The margin of sampling error was plus or minus 3 percentage points.
sentences.chinese: 抽樣錯誤的差額是正負3%。

definition: to file away/to place on file
